儛字的基本解释

儛
wǔ
古同“舞”。

儛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wǔ］
［《廣韻》文甫切，上麌，微。］
(1)舞蹈，跳舞。
(2)耍，玩弄。参见“儛招”。

儛字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　儛； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页120第09
【集韻】同舞。【莊子·在宥篇】鼓歌以儛之。【楚辭·九歌】丘陵翔儛。【註】山丘踴躍而歡喜也。　又朝儛，齊山名。　又儛衞。【周禮·冬官考工記矢人夾而搖之註】今人以指夾矢儛衞是也。儛衞謂挾搖聲，試矢者，以指撚箭鏃，去有聲，以徵其直也。

儛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
儛字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
儛
wǔ
Gu Tong "dance".
儛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wǔ］
["Guangyun" Wen Fuqie, Shangzhe, Wei. ]
(1) Dance, dance.
(2) Play and play. See "Hanging".
儛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [The Department of Human Characters] 　儛; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 120 Page 09
【Jiyun】Dancing together. [Zhuangzi·Zaiyou Chapter] Drum songs are used to stop them. [Songs of Chu·Nine Songs] The hills are soaring. [Note] The hills are enthusiastic and joyful.　Chao 儛 again, the name of Qishan.　And guard again. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gongji Note that the arrow is clipped and shaken by the arrow] Today's people use the finger to clip the arrow to guard the defense. Wei Wei said that he shook his voice, and those who tried the arrow would twist the arrow with the finger to make a sound, in order to levy the straightness.
